department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch: 通過報告演示、討論和頭腦激盪，培養學生的批判性和創造性思維，以發現 HCI 期刊論文的一些優勢、劣勢和潛力。學生可能會被分組進行一些協作以準備論文報告演示，此外將要求學生思考如何整合先進技術，改進學生在期中報告中提交的 HCI 設計。因此，學生將學習如何共同解決問題，培養人機交互的研究意識。”
goal.en: “Foster Students‘ critical and creative thinking through presentation, discussion and brainstorming for finding some strengths, weaknesses, and potentials of the HCI journal papers. Students will possibly be grouped for some collaboration for preparing paper presentations and will be asked to think how to integrate advanced technologies to improve the HCI design of the paper they presented in the mid-term report. Therefore, students will learn how to solve problems together and cultivate the HCI research sense.“

flexDiscription.ch: 第二階段的總結報告後( 第16 周)，後續二周(第17-18周)請學生依據師生的建議，進行修改與精進，讓研究的完整性與深度可以提升。
flexDiscription.en: After the summary report of the second stage (week 16), the following two weeks (weeks 17-18) ask students to revise and improve according to the suggestions of teachers and students, so that the integrity and depth of research can be improved.
